deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 11 hrs 15 mins
features: Small Size with Big use: USB flash drive with 64GB capacity, meet your needs of daily use on work, school, home and travelling for photos, music, videos, files storage and transfer. For each 64 GB, you could store 23 Hrs of Video (1080P/ 6Mbps), or 20,000 Photos (10MP/ 3 Mb), or 15,000 Songs (4 Mb), or 150,000 + Office word doc (400 Kb).

Super Convenient: Plug and play, no driver needed. Ideal for outdoor workers to store large-capacity data. Support Win98/ME/2000/XP/Vista/7/8/10 and Linux, support portable speakers, car speakers with USB 2.0 port.

Widely Compatibility: Media Formats Supported by KEXIN Flash Drive--- Music: M4A / AIFF / CAF / MP3 / WAV; Image: GIF / JPG / PNG / JPEG; Video: AVI / FLV / M4V / MKV / MOV / MP4 / RMVB; Document: DOC / PPT / XLS / XLSX / PDF / HTML / TX.

Compatible with USB 2.0 and backwards: USB flash drive features greater performance than standard USB 2.0 flash drive, has the speed and reliability of solid state drive and the portability of thumb drive, and works very well for transferring files; features dustproof, shockproof, wear resistance, even when falling into water, it still can work normally after drying. USB 2.0 chip. Reading speed is about 15MB/s. Writing speed is about 4MB/s.
Warranty &support: We are professional at thumb drive, every piece was tested before delivery. We can provide 30-day refund guarantee 12-month warranty, let you buy with confident.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.4 4.4 out of 5 stars 1,702 ratings 4.4 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Save time to upload files, make life and work easy. 64G memory capacity, allows you to store a large number of files, such as photos, music, videos. The features of strong practicality and delicate appearance make it a perfect choice for a gift or present. We are professional at manufacturing jump drives, and every piece is strictly tested before delivery, which let you buy with confident.

This flash drive is water-resistant and dustproof to withstand daily wear and tear, as well as shockproof to survive accidental drops. Grade-A NAND flash ensures more protections for your important information. No need to install any software. Plug into the USB port of computer or other devices, then use it! Not only helps keep your digital files in the mini size, but also stay with them in your pockets. LED indicator design: when your computer is recognizing the flash drive, the LED indicator will light up. As for pocket sized, it is easy and convenient to carry.

All photos and videos can be directly saved to the photo stick so there is no need to worry about the lack of memory on the device. Just directly connect the photo stick to your device, and you could enjoy the instant large capacity to record more favorite fragments on Christmas, Birthday, and Party. Adds 64GB external space to your tablets, and you can store 23 Hrs of Video (1080P/ 6Mbps), or 20,000 Photos (10MP/ 3 Mb), or 15,000 Songs (4 Mb), or 150,000 + Office word doc (400 Kb). 64GB: with usable storage space of 58GB.
USB 2.0 flash drive has the speed and reliability of solid state drive and the portability of thumb drive, and works very well for transferring files. Share your good time, anywhere.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Colorful and Good Value
reviews.reviewText: I wanted a Thumbdrive that I could find in my drawer and also one that I could label. I lend them out and don't always get them back. So, I wanted something that would be "seen" by the borrower. Anyway, these are attractive and do the trick. One cap doesn't stay on, and that's a nuisance. Don't know how to fix that problem, small as it is. But these are just fine, and, oh! A really good value...that means they weren't over-priced... Yea!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars 9/10 worked perfectly - 1 was bad
reviews.reviewText: These are super nice flash drives. They look really nice, too. We needed 10 to share videos with friends. One of the flash drives was unusable. Not recognized by either Mac or PC.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Work as they should
reviews.reviewText: These store a lot of files and I was able to transfer everything from my computer onto this set of flash drives without any problem.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Classy Design and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: We use these to give to our speakers at our Rotary club weekly meeting. We add a clear return address label and download an international cookbook to the drive. Looks and works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: USB Flash Drive arrived on time and works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Was Not Recognized As A USB Drive
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this item to transfer item from the computet to my Brother SE2000 embroidery machine. It never worked. I even tried to copy item downloaded for my class to our work printer, and again it never recognized it as a USB drive. I tried all three and none of them worked. I will have to purchase another Imation USB stick because I know that worked. Yeah, the price was right, but it wasn't worth me not being able to use it for what I purchase it for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to write and great storage size
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. As a graphic designer I send all of my clients a copy of their files via USB drive when our business is done. These drives are not only gorgeous but also very practical/functional. I’m able to write the files very quickly and there’s plenty of space on each one. I have gotten nothing but good feedback from clients on ease of use as well
